items.title: Supreme Court takes case of Rastafarian whose head was shaved by prison guards
items.description: The Supreme Court announced it will take up the case of a devout Rastafarian whose dreadlocks were forcibly shaved by Louisiana prison guards.

items.title: In West Virginia, Medicaid is a lifeline. GOP cuts could devastate the state.
items.description: GOP states are particularly reliant on a program that President Donald Trump and other Republicans have targeted for deep spending reductions.

items.title: How Israel deceived the United States about its nuclear weapons program
items.description: Israel is attacking Iran’s nuclear sites, but Tehran’s secret path was blazed by the Israelis.
